name: Rock-Paper-Scissors - R.P.S.
description:
Let's call the rules to mind. Rock beats scissors, scissors beats lizard, paper beats Spock.

You think it's simple? Yes it is. But the road to your victory will not be easy.

Bring the tactictics to the game. Improvise, don't be predictable, find your lucky combination, join the variety of leagues, earn money and cristalls for buying new hands and and making huge bets.

Defeat you opponents!

Play Rock-Paper-Scissors now!

Features:
Play online with your friends!
Tons of different hands
Play 3 or 5 shapes
